AlarmName.Description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm to be monitored for the component.

Severity.Description: Indicates the degree of outage when the alarm goes off.

AlarmMetricName.Description: The name of the metric to be monitored for the component.

SubComponentTypeConfigurations.Description: Sub component configurations of the component.

CustomComponentConfiguration.Description: The monitoring configuration of the component.

DefaultOverwriteComponentConfiguration.Description: The overwritten settings on default component monitoring configuration.

Tier.Description: The tier of the application component.

AlarmMetrics.Description: A list of metrics to monitor for the component.

Alarms.Description: A list of alarms to monitor for the component.

HAClusterPrometheusExporter.Description: The HA cluster Prometheus Exporter settings.

HANAPrometheusExporter.Description: The HANA DB Prometheus Exporter settings.

Logs.Description: A list of logs to monitor for the component.

WindowsEvents.Description: A list of Windows Events to log.

ResourceList.Description: The list of resource ARNs that belong to the component.

AgreeToInstallHANADBClient.Description: A flag which indicates agreeing to install SAP HANA DB client.

Encoding.Description: The type of encoding of the logs to be monitored.

LogGroupName.Description: The CloudWatch log group name to be associated to the monitored log.

LogPath.Description: The path of the logs to be monitored.

LogType.Description: The log type decides the log patterns against which Application Insights analyzes the log.

PatternSet.Description: The name of the log pattern set.

PatternName.Description: The name of the log pattern.

LogPatterns.Description: The log patterns of a set.

PatternSetName.Description: The name of the log pattern set.

AlarmMetrics.Description: A list of metrics to monitor for the component.

Logs.Description: A list of logs to monitor for the component.

WindowsEvents.Description: A list of Windows Events to log.

SubComponentConfigurationDetails.Description: The configuration settings of sub components.

Key.Description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.Description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

EventLevels.Description: The levels of event to log.

EventName.Description: The type of Windows Events to log.

LogGroupName.Description: The CloudWatch log group name to be associated to the monitored log.

PatternSet.Description: The name of the log pattern set.

ApplicationARN.Description: The ARN of the ApplicationInsights application.

AutoConfigurationEnabled.Description: If set to true, application will be configured with recommended monitoring configuration.

CWEMonitorEnabled.Description: Indicates whether Application Insights can listen to CloudWatch events for the application resources.

ComponentMonitoringSettings.Description: The monitoring settings of the components.

GroupingType.Description: The grouping type of the application

OpsCenterEnabled.Description: When set to true, creates opsItems for any problems detected on an application.

OpsItemSNSTopicArn.Description: The SNS topic provided to Application Insights that is associated to the created opsItem.

ResourceGroupName.Description: The name of the resource group.

Tags.Description: The tags of Application Insights application.
